name: GetClassicAutomationsSummary
description:
Fetch a summary of an account's classic automations.

Call this tool to obtain a summary of classic automations set up in a Mailchimp account, useful for understanding automation configurations and statuses.

parameters.name: number_of_records_to_return
parameters.description: The number of automation records to return. Default is 10, maximum is 1000.

value_schema.description: The number of records to return. Default value is 10. Maximum value is 1000

parameters.name: pagination_offset
parameters.description: Number of records to skip for pagination. Default is 0.

value_schema.description: Used for [pagination](https://mailchimp.com/developer/marketing/docs/methods-parameters/#pagination), this is the number of records from a collection to skip. Default value is 0.

parameters.name: fields_to_return
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of fields to include in the response, using dot notation for sub-objects.

value_schema.description: A comma-separated list of fields to return. Reference parameters of sub-objects with dot notation.

parameters.name: exclude_fields_list
parameters.description: A comma-separated list of fields to exclude. Use dot notation for sub-objects.

value_schema.description: A comma-separated list of fields to exclude. Reference parameters of sub-objects with dot notation.

parameters.name: restrict_before_create_time
parameters.description: Restrict the response to automations created before the specified time in ISO 8601 format. Example: 2015-10-21T15:41:36+00:00.

value_schema.description: Restrict the response to automations created before this time. Uses the ISO 8601 time format: 2015-10-21T15:41:36+00:00.

parameters.name: created_after_time
parameters.description: Specify the time to filter automations created after this date-time. Use ISO 8601 format, e.g., 2015-10-21T15:41:36+00:00.

value_schema.description: Restrict the response to automations created after this time. Uses the ISO 8601 time format: 2015-10-21T15:41:36+00:00.

parameters.name: restrict_to_automations_started_before
parameters.description: Restrict the response to automations started before this time using ISO 8601 format (e.g., 2015-10-21T15:41:36+00:00).

value_schema.description: Restrict the response to automations started before this time. Uses the ISO 8601 time format: 2015-10-21T15:41:36+00:00.

parameters.name: start_time_after
parameters.description: Restrict the response to automations started after this date and time in ISO 8601 format (e.g., 2015-10-21T15:41:36+00:00).

value_schema.description: Restrict the response to automations started after this time. Uses the ISO 8601 time format: 2015-10-21T15:41:36+00:00.

parameters.name: automation_status_filter
parameters.description: Specify the status of automations to filter results (e.g., 'active', 'paused').

value_schema.description: Restrict the results to automations with the specified status.
